```{r}
# load libraries ----
library(tidyverse)
library(GGally)
library(skimr)
```

```{r}
# explore data ----

names(diamonds)

dim(diamonds)

summary(diamonds)

head(diamonds)

tail(diamonds)

skimr::skim(diamonds)

# create a pairs plot ----
ggpairs(data= diamonds)

# create a scatterplot ----
ggplot(data= diamonds, aes(x= carat, y= price)) +
  geom_point(size= 0.1)

# create a histogram ----
ggplot(data= diamonds, aes(x= carat)) +
  geom_histogram()
```
